name: The Viridian Isles
description:
Explore the procedurally generated Viridian Isles, enjoy the tranquil ambience of nature reclaiming the ruins, collect crystals from nooks and crannies, befriend the clunky robots, all the while learning the ins and outs of the overgrown ruins.

CONTROLS : 

Left Click to Pick up and set down objects

Right Click to Push and throw objects

R to respawn
